ygData.subject: Energonians and Quasar
ygData.msgSnippet: Hell Beast, cured by the small amount of Liquid Energon administered by Paddle Tail, was alive and well agian. He felt so much better. Hmm.....Whoever

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast, cured by the small amount of Liquid Energon administered 
by Paddle Tail, was alive and well agian. He felt so much better.
       "Hmm.....Whoever injected me with that poison will pay. I want whoever 
it was to dule me agian." Hell Beast went on telling Gremlin. "No one gets 
away with this, no one."

       Venus landed the Shuttle near Quasar. She exited, with her Energon 
riffle in tow, and stalked her silently. All she would need would be a single 
shot, and the bot would be out cold. But, mabey she didnt need to her Quasar 
at all.
       As dropped her weapon back into its holster, and approached the bot. 
"Hello there....so I hear your lost little girl? I can help you find your 
way."

--part1_17.f48cfc3.2773d6e7_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
